User.title: User
User.description: Represents a registered user of the BioBloom application, primarily for authentication and access control. This entity stores minimal user identification data.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity (matches Firebase Auth UID).

Page.title: Page
Page.description: Represents a single, user-created 'Bento' page with all its content and appearance settings.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Page entity.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns this page.

slug.description: The unique, user-defined URL slug for the page.

displayName.description: The public name displayed on the page.

bio.description: A short biography or description displayed on the page.

avatarUrl.description: URL to the user's profile picture for this page.

avatarHint.description: AI hint for the avatar image.

Link.title: Link
Link.description: Represents a single custom link or content block on a user's Page.

pageId.description: Reference to the Page this link belongs to.

thumbnailHint.description: AI hint for the thumbnail image.

SlugLookup.title: SlugLookup
SlugLookup.description: A lookup document to map a unique URL slug to a Page ID for fast public lookups.

pageId.description: The ID of the Page this slug points to.

definition.description: Stores core authentication information. Document ID is the Firebase Auth UID. Private to the user.
Stores all data for a single Bento page. Publicly readable, but only writable by the owner.
Stores links for a specific page. Publicly readable, writable by the page owner.
A public lookup table to map unique URL slugs to page IDs. Writable only by the page owner.
